headline.main: WINTER DEPRIVES NAZIS OF INITIATIVE; Weather Is Now in Control Along the Russian Front, Say Vichy Observers CRIMEA IS LONE EXCEPTION Only Rostov and Kerch Straits Stand in the Way of a Drive Into the Caucasus Proper

lead_paragraph: VICHY, France, Nov. 20 -- The outstanding feature of the campaign in Russia, in the view of competent observers here, is that, apart from the Crimea, there has been relatively little change since the first of this month. Consequently there is much talk now of a war of position.
abstract: Winter seen depriving Germans of initiative on all fronts except Crimea
